title: I want to write a scientific article well. Can I? How? - Quora

response.answer_text: I want to write a scientific article well. Can I? How? I’m going to go out on a limb and say that you won’t be able to accomplish your goal anytime soon. Strangers can’t know if you are capable of writing anything competently, so to ask them if you can do so suggests a lack of intellectual rigor. The wording of your question is also weak. A better question would be this: How can I learn to write scientific articles?

Check out Dr. Kristin Sainani’s course - Writing in the Sciences on Coursera platform (offered by Stanford). This is the best course I took on science writing, it helped me a lot with my manuscripts. https://www.coursera.org/learn/sciwrite
